application.desc: GROBID - A machine learning software for extracting information from scholarly documents

div.head: Names and affiliations of applicants (* indicates experimentalists):
div.p: Hoh Francois and Labesse Gilles 1/. NAD kinase 22 datasets collected for 16 different compouds. 8 ligands were not visibles. Complex with NAD and NADP were refinded Refinement in progress for high lengthwave (1.7A) datasets for the complexe with NAD and NADP

div.head: 2/. MOMP85h
div.p: Three datasets of native and 2 datasets of dertivatives were collected (about 5A). Very bad isomorphism between nat and der. Some potentiels HA sites were Identified but no interpretable map

div.head: 3/. Ccpn
div.p: Two data sets, of 180 images each, recorded on crystals formed by the CcpN regulatory domain, soaked with a mix of potential ligands. One dataset (2.5 A resolution) showed significantly enlarged mosaicity, and a four times as big asymetric unit (a and b were doubled), as compared to native crystals. Dataset 2 yielded good 2.0 A data (Rmerge = 0.087, I/sigI = 21.8, 98.9% complete). Structural analysis showed that indeed one of the ligands is found fixed in the structure originating from dataset 2.

div.head: 4/. Some tests on other subjects without diffraction (plcr+peptide, cggr, p14+PH-AKT)
